name: Chicken Nugget Eating Simulator Deluxe
description:
ever wanted to eat chicken nuggets? or you already have them at home? (oops..)

well then Chicken Nugget Eating Simulator Deluxe is a thing for somebody out there.

if you're wondering why it's "deluxe" and not 2, it's because i wanted to make the name longer.

and if you're wondering where the first one went, well it's a scratch game. don't play it. and if you're still want to play it, let me get the attention to the list of new features:

  • improved graphics
  • more realistic eating experience
  • lotsa customization
  • le shop
  • a tutorial
  • title screen
